name: GitLab direct file access
description: Navigate directly to a specific file in a GitLab repository for viewing or editing. Optimized for WebArena tasks that work with known files like LICENSE, README, etc.

steps.description: Navigate directly to the specified file in the repository.

input_schema.name: base_url
input_schema.description: GitLab base URL with protocol (e.g., https://gitlab.example.com)

input_schema.name: project_path
input_schema.description: Project path without leading slash (e.g., username/projectname)

input_schema.name: ref
input_schema.description: Branch, tag, or commit reference (e.g., main, master, v1.0.0)

input_schema.name: file_path
input_schema.description: Path to the file within the repository (e.g., LICENSE, README.md, src/main.py)
